title: HTML 3D Element & Native GLTF
summary: A proposal on HTML 3D element, to bring rich 3D & AR experience to Web with a single line of code. Use cases include on-line shopping, creative advertisement,education, etc. Another related idea is for a scene element proposal . Demo prototypes will be provided.
goals: Gauge developer interest in native 3D support in HTML (similar to image/audio/video tag) and looking forward to a wider collaboration with the community, as well as standardization in W3C.
